name: Lawnet Downloader
short_description:
ANNOUNCEMENT: Caselist Free Beta now released!

Download the Android version of this app at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.customautosys.caselist

This program allows cases to be downloaded from reading lists quickly, saving students' time.
Author: Wilson Foo Yu Kang
Maintainer, SMU: Kevin Quah Lian Shen (kevin.quah.2010@law.smu.edu.sg)
Maintainer, NUS: Please contact NUS Law Club (academics@nuslawclub.com)
summary: A lawnet downloader for students of SMU and NUS
